title: Eternum LFM [Bronze/Silver] [Top/Mid]
body:
Hi all, ADC and leader of Eternum here, we're a low elo team looking to climb and get better at the game.

Currently looking for a mid laner and top laner to fill the spots.

If you want to join:
_IGN - LetsTwitch
Skype - letstwitch
Post Below_

replies.body: Hey I'm a level 7 darius main and can play zed and yasuo mid add me if interested

hey, i main {{champion:131}} jg but im sure i could become a useful player in top as i dont as such as main anyone for top but i am quite versatile. im sure i could start to focus and main top if a position becomes free in your team. message me on lol as im on pretty much every day "JohnsonDaily".

Hi there, I'm a silver Azir main. I can play practically everyone, I am keen to join your team as long as the team does not flame at each other. I can play from mon to fri from 10:30am to 4:00pm every day for 2 weeks (school holidays). Then I can only play after 3:00pm on sat and sun for the whole day.
My IGN is: Azirious Bird
My Skype name is: jerayrays


{{champion:268}}

Hey, I am in bronze and I main mid. I would like to think that I can play ahri/le blanc quite decently. However, I can play most mid lakers with great ease. I just have a preference to those two because they are easier to carry with. 
-- My in game name is:  FearoftheDark

Hey, I Would love to join your team. 
I Main Top mostly as {{champion:98}} and can support quite well.
hey i am top and mid laner also a support my ign is legogoliath and my skype is albertron261
